name: Kitchen+
0:
”Alexa, tell kitchen plus to set airfryer cooking time to 6 minutes and temperature to 200 degrees.”
”Alexa, tell kitchen plus to turn off my airfryer.”
”Alexa, tell kitchen plus to turn on my airfryer.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kitchen plus
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This Kitchen+ skill lets you control the Connected Airfyer and Aircooker devices. 

To enable this skill: 
1. Install the Philips NutriU app from the Google Play Store or iOS App Store. 
2. Follow the on-screen instructions to connect your Philips smart Airfryer and Aircooker to your phone. You’ll need to create or log in to your Philips online account. 
3. Enable the Philips Kitchen+ skill in the Amazon Alexa app by tapping the button at the top of this screen and logging in to your Philips account. 

For additional support, please visit https://www.philips.co.uk/c-w/support-home.html
